1.0.name: wordpress/mg-advancedoptions
1.0.description:
The new post revision system in Wordpress 2.6 needs a lot of database performance and with this Plugin these can be turned off. The Plugin can managed comfortable over the Adminpanel.

Plugin related Links:

  • Plugin Homepage
  • Support-Forum

Changelog:

  • v1.4 - Change Plugin Folder
  • v1.3 - Added French Translation (Thanks Fred!)
  • v1.2 - Fixed Bug: load_text_domain()
  • v1.1 - Added I18n Support
  • v1.0 - First Release
